root.name: The Rocketeer
root.description: OverviewYou control Cliff on a mission to stop a terrorist organization from stealing a jetpack. The terrorists have also kidnapped Jennifer, who also requires rescuing.TriviaElectronic Gaming Monthly awarded The Rocketeer as their Worst Movie-to-Game of 1992.Critical ReceptionWhen released Electronic Gaming Monthly awarded the scores of 4,6,5,6 stating, "...Despite the nice graphics the cart is boring and way too short".
